text: @jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden Okay-so...no.  He showed that he lies about everything from walking to drinking to crowd sizes.  He called people names & insinuated that the #coronavirus would be obliterated if we just stopped testing for it. So I'm not sure what you were watching...But it wasn't the president.
